posts.postText: The ElectroMagneticKinetic Grenade is a grenade that, when thrown, explodes with ub3r-magnetic powers!  Those powers pull all nearby weapons, props, anything  not  welded to the floor.  After a preset time it would detonate, sending all the props/weapons scattered while some cautious player's thinking, "What the fuck is that?!" While a explosive barrel/large prop flattens him.  Or it could just cause damage to all players that get hit by the props, but it's still badass either way :3
